entities.name: pansy
entities.description: Pansy is mentioned as a person that the students are looking at.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is awe-struck and overwhelmed by wands emerging everywhere.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as a teacher giving instructions to the students.

entities.name: miss parkinson
entities.description: Miss Parkinson is mentioned as a person who is thanked by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: mr. filch
entities.description: Mr. Filch is mentioned as a teacher who will leave the Hall first with Miss Parkinson.

entities.name: slytherins
entities.description: Slytherin house is mentioned as one of the houses that are leaving the Hall.

entities.name: ravenclaws
entities.description: Ravenclaw house is mentioned as another house that is following on after Slytherins.

entities.name: hufflepuffs
entities.description: Hufflepuff house is mentioned as a house with some students remaining behind.

entities.name: creevey
entities.description: Creevey is mentioned as a person who is being told to go by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: peakes
entities.description: Peakes is mentioned as another person who is being told to go by Professor McGonagall.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall thanks Miss Parkinson for something.
Professor McGonagall tells Mr. Filch to leave the Hall first with Miss Parkinson.
Professor McGonagall tells Slytherin house to leave the Hall.
Professor McGonagall tells Ravenclaw house to follow on after Slytherins.
Professor McGonagall has to chivvy the underage Hufflepuff students to leave the Hall.
Professor McGonagall tells Creevey to go.
Professor McGonagall also tells Peakes to go.
